thread.section_title: Adultsmart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Adultsmart | adultsmart.com.au
thread.title: Btv

author: Btv
title: Btv
text: Dishonesy salewomem calls at late hours to demand you change your review. Contradicts her own story of orders, saying an order is placed yet in the same sentence says there never was an order. Do not order from if you expect to be treated respectfully by the HR. Im only editing this to warn others of the "dishonest" advertising that i FEEL is dishonest. These people will remove negative feedback claiming defamation for selling "dishonest" products. They will call without your knowledge of having your number.
